message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be a great fit for you. I'm thinking of a price around $12,000 to start. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I understand its value to you, but my budget is limited. Could we discuss a price closer to $9,000?
I appreciate your offer, Bob.  While I'm motivated to sell, I can't quite go down to $9,000.  Would you consider $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, could we discuss a price closer to $10,000?
